question: All of a sudden the fingertips of the index finger and middle finger on my right hand are painful (very), swollen, and blue. I am a retired teacher very athletic  6'3'' 185 lbs, 66 years old, no medical conditions, no diabetes. Have not injured my fingers. Anyone have any ideas what this could be and/or any possible remedies?  Thanks much, Henry
title: Painful, swollen, blue fingertips
